txt.en: 'There are no songs more beautiful than those of the Elves. Soon this community will be filled with singing!'
'We must show joy even as the land darkens, for without joy, we have no hope....'
'There are many feastdays ahead, and we must be prepared for them!'
'A plague upon dwarves! The Dourhands at Kheled√ªl are certain to spoil our festivities!'
